name: Limitless
description: Limitless Vision – Limitless Volume – Limitless Rewards The first Solana reward token with buyback and burn, and the limitless volume function integrated into the script. Inspired by the 2011 movie, THIS Limitless VERSION is more than just a token—it’s a gateway to unlocking continuous rewards. Just like the NZT48 pill enhanced the mind, NZT48 enhances the way reward tokens work, ensuring sustainable volume and passive income for holders.
